EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: RA test email
EmailTemplate.subject: RA test email subject
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Nanjing Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
This is a revised email template setup in June 2012, to be used by all the schools.
It is important you don't touch the top and bottom text sections, and only edit the text in the body of the email. To create a new email, simply clone this template or clone any future emails that have used this email template.
Regards,
Administration Team The British School of Nanjing World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
